subject: Re: need help in installing JUnit ;New in using Junit
msgSnippet: hi prasad , I gave classpath to junit but when i gave this command ************************************************************ C: java
messageBody:
hi prasad ,
I gave classpath to junit but when i gave this command
************************************************************
C:\>java junit.textui.TestRunner junit.samples.AllTests
Class not found "junit.samples.AllTests"
********************************************************

it gives this error

pls tell what should I do?

Thanks

harish

- In junit@yahoogroups.com, N V K VaraPrasada Rao R
<varaprasad_1261@y...> wrote:
>
> --- saravanan.thirugnanam@s... wrote:
>
>
> ---------------------------------
> Hi,
> Could u please quote what problem you are facing so
> that we can suggest a
> solution ?
> -------------------------------------------------------------------
-----
>
>
>
>
> hi All
>
> I am Harish , just now i joined this group. I have to
> use junit for
> testing java product. I try to installed but still it
> isnot working.
> would anyone help me for installation.
>
> Thanking you in advance
>
> Waitnig for Reply
> --harish
>
>
>
>
> Hello Harish,
>
> After Downloading the junit from junit.org, unzip
> junit.jar and add it to your class path.
>
> Run the sample tests to ensure junit is installed
> correctly.
>
> For futher details regarding installation see junit
> faqs
>
> With regards
> Vara Prasad
>
>
